faqs.title: When will CryptoCelts drop?
content: The drop date of our first collection-CryptoCelts:Druids-has not been officially announced. so stay tuned!

faqs.title: What blockchain(s) are CryptoCelts minted on?
content: The CryptoCelts: Druids collection will be minted on Polygon

faqs.title: Where can I buy a CryptoCelt NFT?
content: The CryptoCelts: Druids collection will be listed on

links.title: Click here to learn how to create an OpenSea account

faqs.title: How do I stay safe in the NFT space?
content: To learn more about staying safe and protecting your NFTs, check out these

links.title: tips by OpenSea for staying safe in the NFT space

faqs.title: How do I purchase a CryptoCelt NFT?
content:
The CryptoCelts: Druids collection will be minted on Polygon and listed on OpenSea. To purchase an NFT minted on Polygon you will need Polygon ETH. 
 If you already have Ethereum (ETH), you can spend your ETH on Polygon by 'bridging' them across the Polygon blockchain.

links.title: Learn more about purchasing NFTs on Polygon

faqs.title: What wallet should I use?
content: The CryptoCelts: Druids collection will be listed on OpenSea.
If you're not sure how to install and connect a wallet to OpenSea, check out their

links.title: Check out this list of wallets that are compatible with OpenSea
